item.title: Script help
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“junior, post:11, topic:49902”]so your saying i should take out my breaks? can i leave the findents and findhead in there?
EDIT: but if what your saying is right cheese, why does it work fine for the first while do, the ‘Tree’ one?[/quote]
No, what I’m saying is that it will sit there and always result true no matter what… If you have the text moved over the oak, the Uptext will always result true. Therefore, the script gets stuck in an endless loop until it logs out.

Read full topic

item.title: Script help
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

so your saying i should take out my breaks? can i leave the findents and findhead in there?
EDIT: but if what your saying is right cheese, why does it work fine for the first while do(the ‘Tree’ one) and when i put “break” in my repeat and untils?

item.title: Script help
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Nah, thats commented out guys…

Your problem is, you have the script checking to see if the Oak text is there. If it is, the script will continually wait, until a random is found… This will make it wait forever technically.

Read full topic

item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

//findent(treec);
//if findent(trec) then break;

There’s a problem there i think. Not sure but i believe it should be this:

//if findent(treec) then break;

item.title: Script help
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

sure, no problem. ill post the whole procedure for you. the first while do works perfectly when im cutting down the tree, but the oak, it just stops and doesnt do anything at all after it clicks on it.

[php]procedure checktwaitt;
var
sinvcount, estartcount, twait, cx, cy : integer;
begin
if (tree = ‘Tree’) then
begin
sinvcount:= inventorycount
estartcount:= sinvcount
while (sinvcount = estartcount) do
begin
ftwait(1)
if (findnormalrandoms) then break;
estartcount:= inventorycount
end;
end else
if (tree = ‘Oak’) then
begin
marktime(twait)
repeat
FindObj(cx, cy, ‘own O’, treec, 25)
ftwait(1)
if (findnormalrandoms) then break;
until FindObj(cx, cy, ‘own O’, treec, 25) or
(timefrommark(twait) = 30000) and not (FindObj(cx, cy, ‘own O’, treec, 25))
if FindObj(cx, cy, ‘own O’, treec, 25) then
while (isuptextmulti(‘Oak’, ‘n Oa’, ‘own O’)) do
begin
ftwait(1)
//findhead;
//findent(treec);
//if findent(trec) then break;
if (findnormalrandoms) then break;
end;
begin
mouse(648, 83, 8, 8, true);
wait(2000 + random(5000));
end;
end else
if (timefrommark(twait) = 30000) and not (FindObj(cx, cy, ‘own O’, treec, 25)) then
begin
writeln(‘cannot find tree, please restart script.’);
//progress;
terminatescript;
end;
end;[/php]

Read full topic
